title: NFL Week 13, Fastest 2 Minutes, The Lions Won A Game & Big Ben's Victory Lap
description:
Fastest 2 Minutes (00:01:59 - 00:07:56) Chiefs, Broncos (00:07:56 - 00:13:46) Lions, Vikings (00:13:46 - 00:23:14) Chargers, Bengals (00:23:14 - 00:29:22) Eagles, Jets (00:29:22 - 00:33:52) Dolphins, Giants (00:33:52 - 00:39:42) Bucs, Falcons (00:39:42 - 00:51:47) Cardinals, Bears (00:51:47 - 00:59:59) Colts, TexansÂ  (00:59:59 - 01:04:04) WFT, Raiders (01:04:04 - 01:11:46) Rams, Jags (01:11:46 - 01:15:30) Seahawks, 49ers (01:15:30 - 01:28:10) Steelers, Ravens (01:28:10 - 01:39:35) Football guy of the week and who's back of the week finishes us off on another Football Monday
